config.description: Analyze boundary conditions and kappa variation

tuning_runs.notes: Neumann: 51%, Dirichlet: 49%. Kappa: 0.05 (45%), 0.1 (55%). Pre-computation might be viable.

tuning_runs.result: FAILED - 100% unique sensor positions (80 out of 80 samples)
tuning_runs.notes: Sensor heterogeneity prevents pre-computation of Green's function lookup tables.

config.description: Compare Green's function vs ADI timing

tuning_runs.result: FAILED - Green's function is 4.3x SLOWER than ADI
tuning_runs.notes: ADI: 1189ms, Green's (50 terms): 5151ms. Series convergence requires many terms.

config.description: Check if direct inversion is possible

tuning_runs.result: FAILED - Inversion is nonlinear, still requires optimization
tuning_runs.notes: Source position appears in sin(nÏ€x_s/Lx) terms. No closed-form inverse exists.

finding: Green's function is 4.3x SLOWER than ADI (5151ms vs 1189ms). Sensor heterogeneity (100% unique) prevents pre-computation. Inversion is nonlinear (source in sin/cos terms). No advantage over ADI + CMA-ES. direct_inversion family EXHAUSTED.
